## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATMYR1, MYR1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS MYB-RELATED PROTEIN 1, myb-related protein 1
- **Description:**   myb-related protein 1;(source:Araport11)
